title: Himi 174
lyrics:
6-8’s
1.
’E hoku Fakamo’ui,
Mo e kakai kotoa pē,
Ko e hā ia ne ke fai,
‘I ho tautau ‘i he ‘akau
Mo ho’ fa’a kātaki ai,
‘A e mamahi lahi fau?
2.
‘Oiauē, ko e hā nai
Ne ke to’e, pea ‘oi;
Pea longo ‘i he mate
‘I he’eku anga kovi
‘Eiki Sīsū anga’ofa
Fakahā hono ‘uhinga.
3.
Ko e hifo mahu’inga,
Sīsū, ‘a e ‘Afiona,
Ko e fu’u totongi ia,
‘Oku ne ‘aofia au;
Koe’uhi ke u hoko ai,
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona.
4.
Na’e pekia mo’oni,
‘Eku hifo pani toto;
Ko e fakatau ma’aku,
‘A e fakamolemole,
Mo e anga kuo fo’ou,
Ko hoku teu ki hēvani. *
